title: When there's a defect, what to do?
intro: The supplier has up to 30 days to fix the defect through authorized technical assistance.

accordion.options_title: üîÑ Customer options if not resolved in 30 days
accordion.l1: Product exchange for an equal or similar one

attention_text: Deadline to complain: 90 days for durable products.

accordion_electro.title: üì¶ Procedure for Appliances
accordion_electro.text: Appliances must be sent to the brand's technical assistance. If after 30 days there's no solution, the company may exchange with a service order.

accordion_registro.title: üìù How to register in the system
accordion_registro.intro: When the customer requests information about technical assistance:
accordion_registro.l1: Guide the customer to send the product to the brand's assistance
accordion_registro.l3: If not resolved in 30 days, the company can exchange with a service order

quiz.question: A customer bought a mixer 2 months ago and the motor stopped working. Where do you register this service and what do you advise?
quiz.opt_a: A) Register in COMPLAINT > APPLIANCES and inform they can exchange directly at the store.
quiz.opt_b: B) Register in INFORMATION > PURCHASES > TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE DATA and advise to send to the brand's assistance.
quiz.opt_c: C) Inform that since it's been over 30 days from purchase, we can't help.
quiz.opt_d: D) Register in RETURN and request immediate refund.
quiz.feedback: Correct Answer! Appliances must first be sent to the brand's technical assistance.
